attributes.action: Ensure that Oliver Johnson pays his dom perignon debt to Michael Jones and Daniel Lawton By the end of February.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Oliver Johnson entered himself into a bet, now he will not pay up. The bet was lost and it means that me ( Michael Jones) and Daniel Lawton are both owed a bottle of dom perignon, I am writing a petition to get people to sign which should influence him to pay off his debt as soon as possible.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
